name: Pour Water 3D
description:
- Brain-challenging and addictive color placement game.
- Your challenge begins as you act as a manager in your smoothie shop. The customer chooses the smoothie template in the store and your task is to create the smoothie cup as the sample cup comes. Try to train your brain, pouring water from cup to cup to get the right smoothie. You will have 1, 2, or 3 empty cups depending on the level to assist you in the process of pouring water from cup to cup.
- Use your wits and dexterity to bring customers the best smoothies.
HOW TO PLAY
- Click on any glass to pour the water into another.
- Try not to get stuck, but you can still choose to start over if you can't continue pouring water into another glass.
- Consider choosing the right smoothie to pour into another cocktail
- Rules for filling smoothies by the sample are available
CHARACTERISTIC:
- Simple one-handed play mode
- Many unique challenging levels
- Free and easy to play
- No time limit, as long as you can finish the game
- Arrange the smoothies according to the pattern to complete the game, how many levels can you pass and measure your wits with your friends. Download Juice Puzzle Day to challenge your brain and become the smartest manager.
If you love the game please rate us 5 stars and leave your feedback below the comments, we will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you!
